response.overview: Visit the wonderful sights and sound of the beach and discover a world of dolphins, sand toys and the blue sea! Designed to foster development in children ages 6 months to 4 years, the award-winning BABY ROAD TRIP series introduces important learning concepts through a fun mix of music, puppets, animation, and live action. In this volume, puppet host Ryan takes children to the beach for a lesson in numbers and counting set to kid-friendly island, surf, and reggae music.
response.tagline: Visit the wonderful sights and sound of the beach and discover a world of dolphins, sand toys and the blue sea!
response.title: Baby Road Trip - Beach
